SELECT r.restaurant_id FROM restaurants r
JOIN restaurant_tag_maps rtm_menu ON r.restaurant_id = rtm_menu.restaurant_id JOIN search_tags st_menu ON st_menu.tag_id = rtm_menu.tag_id
JOIN restaurant_tag_maps rtm_tag ON r.restaurant_id = rtm_tag.restaurant_id JOIN search_tags st_tag ON st_tag.tag_id = rtm_tag.tag_id
-- 지정한 날짜, 시간대, 식당ID로 생성된 예약 슬롯들을 확인(없으면 null) LEFT JOIN restaurant_reservation_slots s ON r.restaurant_id = s.restaurant_id
AND s.slot_date = #{date}
AND s.slot_date BETWEEN curdate() and date_add(curdate(), interval 14 day)
AND s.slot_time = #{time} AND s.slot_time BETWEEN r.open_time and r.close_time
AND s.slot_time IN ('11:00:00', '12:00:00', '13:00:00', '14:00:00')
-- 지정한 날짜, 시간대, 식당ID로 생성된 예약 슬롯들을 확인(없으면 null) LEFT JOIN ( -- 지정한 날짜, 시간대에 특정 식당을 예약한 인원수 총합 계산 SELECT slot_id, COALESCE(SUM(party_size), 0) as total_party_size FROM reservations WHERE status IN ('TEMPORARY', 'CONFIRMED', 'PREPAID_CONFIRM', 'REFUND_PENDING') GROUP BY slot_id ) res ON s.slot_id = res.slot_id
r.status = 'OPEN'
AND ( -- Case 1: 특정 식당에 관한 예약 슬롯이 추가된 적이 없음 s.slot_id IS NULL OR -- Case 2: 예약 슬롯이 존재하지만 잔여석이 충분함 s.max_capacity >= (IFNULL(res.total_party_size, 0) + #{partySize}) )
AND st_menu.category = 'MENUTYPE' AND st_menu.content IN
#{menuType}
AND st_tag.category IN ('TABLETYPE', 'ATMOSPHERE', 'FACILITY') AND st_tag.content IN
#{tag}
AND r.preorder_available = true
GROUP BY r.restaurant_id
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT st_tag.content) = #{restaurantTagCount}
